profile.title: Profilu jëfandikukat
profile.mustLogin: War nga dugg ngir mëna gis tegtal yi.
profile.showOriginalAndTranslation: Wone mool ak tekki bi ci benn benn
profile.autoDeleteSeconds: Simili yu kañ gëna teq (bu màbb)
profile.noPrivateKey: Amul caabi biir ci masin bii ngir génne.
profile.setBackupPassword: Fal caabi baatu-bès ngir aar sa day-dox:
profile.importSuccess: Caabi biir bi dugg na ci masin bii.
profile.importFailed: Lajje na jëmm (baatu-bèsu baaxul walla fiiche bi warwi).
profile.keysRotated: Caabi yu bees sànni nañu te caabi u public yónnee na.
profile.keyDisclaimer: Sa caabi biir du génn masin bii. Génneal copia bu aar ak baatu-bès ngir delloo ko ci beneen masin.
profile.themeFreeNotice: Daa ngi ci Free — jëfandikoo Sun/Moon bés-bés yi ci suuf. Yéegal ngir ubbi temas yu gëna bari.
profile.backupTitle: Day-dox yu aar & Jappante ci masin
profile.backupDesc: Defar day-dox yu aar ak baatu-bès, te delloo leen ci beneen masin ngir jappante.
profile.privacyBlurEnabled: Fànn baxal bataaxal yi ci ndorteel
profile.notifyOnCopy: Xamal ma su ñu dajale sama bataaxal
profile.followHint: Sañ naa ñu feeñal seen xew-xew ci sa Feed bu Topp su ñu bind ci ‘Followers’ walla ‘Public’.
profile.sectionCrashedBody: Benn lu lajj na ci kêmb gi.
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Jëleel wañ ak teks yi ñu indil ci sa telefon bu dëgg walla sa imeel bu wóor. Wañ/teks yi nga yónnee man naa feeñ seen nombar Chatforia.
profile.destinationPhoneForCalls: Telefon bu ñuy jëleel (E.164) ngir wañ

chat.selectPrompt: Tànn benn teks walla kër-waxtaan ngir tàmbali waxtaan
chat.emptySubtitle: Yónnee benn bataaxal ngir tàmbali waxtaan.

status.captionLabel: Lan la nekk ci sa xalaat?
status.filesNote: Ba noppi 5 fis. Dayo 24 waxtu ndax ndorteel.

premium.heading: Dugg ci Premium
premium.description: Ubbi jëf jëf yu am doole & yRemovee ad yi.

auth.headline: Waxtaan bu kaarange, gu àdduna, ak tekki boppam
auth.description: Kaarange ba noppi (E2E), tekki AI, bataaxal yi di màbb, ak wañ/wideo.

feature.disappearing: Bataaxal yu màbb & xame-xame wu ñu jàng
feature.privacy: Sutura jëmm. Sa rootaan, sa kayout.

auth.desktopTip: Ci ordinatëër? Skanal ak sa telefon ngir jël aplikasioŋ bi.
auth.subhead: Waxtaan bu sutura, kaarange, te tekki — ci saa-saa.
auth.tip: Mën nga jëfandikoo Chatforia ci benn yite — walla nga yeb aplikasioŋ bi ngir gëna wóor.
auth.scanHint: Skanal ngir yeb aplikasioŋ bi walla ubbi ko ci sa joowkat.

home.title: Ëttu
home.subheader: Yónnee benn bataaxal ngir tàmbali waxtaan.

press.title: Press
press.contact: Ngir mbir yu press, bindleen ci press@chatforia.com.
press.contactText: Ngir mbir yu press, bindleen ci press@chatforia.com.
press.boilerplateText: Chatforia mooy messenger bu kaarange ak tekki ci saa-saa ak E2E, ngir waxtaan yu sutura di yomb te gaaw àdduna sépp.
press.assetsText: Logo, nataali ekran, ak nataali produkt (bi ñu ngi ñëw).

careers.title: Ligéey
careers.intro: Benn ndimbalinu ñu ndaw lanu ñuy def messenger bu sutura, àdduna sépp. Soo bëggee kaarange, doxalin, ak UX bu gëna neex, nanu bëgg la ko.
careers.openRoles: Njiitu ligéey yu ubbeeku: Engineer (Full-stack, iOS, Android), Produkt, Ndimbal.
careers.apply: Na nga申请: Yónnee sa CV/liggéey yi ci jobs@chatforia.com.

about.title: Lu jëm ci Chatforia
about.description: Chatforia mooy messenger bu làkk yu bari, ak kaarange ba noppi, tekki ci saa-saa, ak wañ/wideo. Sunu jom: jàppale ñi ñu jokkoo—ak sutura, kaarange, te sawara làkk.

values.control: Kontorool: Bataaxal yu màbb & xame-xame wu ñu jàng dañu yentoo.

about.howDescription: Bataaxal yi ñu aar leen ci sa masin laata ñuy génn. Tekki, day-dox, ak jappante dañu def ko ngir mbañax sa rootaan lu ngirëmu server yi.

advertise.title: Reklam ak Chatforia
advertise.description: Gis jëfandikukat yu waxtaan ak bannaa bu sell, bu wóor. Nanu am bannaa ci yoon yu xam-xam, sponsòor, ak promosu kër. Ñi ci Premium duñu gis ad.

adsense.withPubId: Leegi nu ngi jëfandikoo Google AdSense. Soo bëggee doxal ci Google Ads, jëfandikoo publisher ID {{pubId}} te laaj managed placement ci seen yunit yii ci suuf. Sponsòor bu jub dafa am — jëfandikoo form bi.
adsense.noPubId: Leegi nu ngi jëfandikoo Google AdSense. Sponsòor bu jub it am na — jëfandikoo form bi ci suuf.

advertise.noPlacements: Amul placeman yu ñu samp ba léegi. Yokk leen ci ads/placements.js.

why.highSession: Doxandéem yu bari ak waxtu yàgg ci UI bu waxtaan
why.brandSafe: Formaat yu sell; taxawal doole bu yóbbu yóbbu
why.sponsoredMoments: Waxtu yu sponsòor (misal, “Tàmbali Waxtaan”) am na
why.deals: Dàgg yu jub walla programmatik ci AdSense/Google Ads

form.submittedMsg: Jërëjëf! Sa laaj mi daldi dem. Dinañu la topp ci kanam.
form.mailtoInfo: Mi ngi ubbi sa joowkat ngir yónnee laaj bi…
form.messageLabel: Waxal nu sa kanamu kampaaŋ bi
form.messagePlaceholder: Target, bes yi, KPI, yéene yi ci placement…

legal.disclaimerStart: Su laaj bi dugg, da ngay Mënaale ak sunu

upgrade.title: Yéegal
upgrade.subtitle: Tànn plan bi la gëna ëpp: neexul ad ak Plus, walla jël jëf jëf yu am doole yépp ak Premium.

features.sameFeatures: Jëf jëf yi mel ni Weer

gettingStarted.title: Tàmbali
gettingStarted.subtitle: Begg nga Chatforia? Jukki bu gaaw bii dina la wone yoon yi, ngir nga tàmbali ci simili.

alert.text: Jàngoro bii dina gën a yomb su nu sàjj jëf jëf yu bees. Soo gisoo lu nekkul, waxleen nu ci

section2.title: 2) Tàmbali waxtaan
section2.item1: Sos DM walla Kër te yónnee sa bataaxal ba jëkk.
section2.item2: Jëfandikoo tekki ci saa-saa ngir waxtaan ci 100+ làkk.
section2.item3: Jëfandikoo bataaxal yu màbb ak xame-xame ci Profil → Sutura.

section3.title: 3) Dem gëna jëm
section3.item1Part2: (Plus = amul ad, Premium = jëf jëf yépp).
section3.item2Part1: Jappal masin yu aju te teg day-dox yu aar ci

account.q: Nan laa sos walla delloo sama kont?
account.a: Yeb aplikasioŋ bi walla jëfandikoo web, bës “Sos kont”, dëggal sa imeel/telefon. Ngir delloo, jëfandikoo “Maññee baatu-jàll”.

privacy.q: Ndax bataaxal yi dañu aar ba noppi?
privacy.a: Waaw. Bataaxal ak wañ da ñu aar ba noppi (E2E) ci default. Yaw ak ki nga waxtaan rekk moñu mën a jàng.

translate.q: Naka la tekki ci saa-saa di dox?
translate.a: Suqal “Tekki boppam” ci Tegtal → Xoolu bopp & Làkk. Nu tekki ci masin bii su mënnee, walla nu jëfandikoo API yu aar ak rootaan tuuti rekk.

contact.a: Bindleen ci support@chatforia.com. Booleel nataal yu ekran ak sa wersiyon.

contact.title: Jokkool
contact.successMsg: Jërëjëf — sunu ekip dina tontu ci imeel.

intro.body: Politig bii jot na ñu xamal ni Chatforia (“ñu”, “sunuy”) di jëm ci japp, jëfandikoo, ak bokk xibaar bi su ngeen jëfandikoo sunu aplikasioŋ ak sarwiis yi. Nu door a def Chatforia ngir wóor sa rootaan yi nu mën a gis.

infoWeCollect.title: Lii lanu japp
infoWeCollect.account: Xibaaru kont (misal, imeel/telefon) ngir sos te aar sa kont.
infoWeCollect.encrypted: Xibaaru aar (bataaxal/wañ) da ñu aar ba noppi; nu mënul leen a jàng.
infoWeCollect.diagnostics: Jàngoro/doxalin ni logu lajj, xeetu masin, walla analitik yu tuuti ngir soppali doxalin.

howWeUse.title: Naka lanu ko jëfandikoo
howWeUse.provide: Joxe ak aar sarwiis bi (auth, seetlu spam/bonnaanu).
howWeUse.improve: Soppali jëf jëf yi (kàddug tekki, wóoru doxalin).
howWeUse.legal: Dànkoo ak li yoon di sant.

sharing.title: Bokk
sharing.body: Duñu jaay xibaaru nit. Man nañu bokk xibaar tuuti ak ñi di doxal sunu sarwiis (misal, push, analitik) ci kaw dundin yu wóor.

rights.title: Sañ sañ yi
rights.body: Gannaaw sa barab (misal, GDPR/UK GDPR/CPRA), mën nga laaj gis, soppali, màbb, walla dëggandigal jëfandikoo yu eene. Jokkool: privacy@chatforia.com.

retention.title: Doxalin ak kaarange
retention.body: Nu denc doxalin bi ñu soxla ngir doxal sarwiis bi te jëfandikoo kaarange bu aju ci industrie. Xibaar E2E mënunu leen a barke.

children.title: Xale yi
children.body: Chatforia du sarwiis bu ñuy jox xale yu ci suuf 13 (wallu ni yoon di ko sant ci sa barab).

changes.title: Yeesal
changes.body: Dinaañu fippu yeesal fii te soppi “Yeesal bi mujj”.

intro.body: Su ngeen jëfandikoo Chatforia, dangay nangu teere yii. Soo nanguwul, buleen jëfandikoo sarwiis bi.

accounts.title: Kont yi
accounts.itemAccurateInfo: Jox xibaar yu dëgg te aar sa caabi yi.
accounts.itemResponsibility: Yaw la war a sukkandiku ci li am ci sa kont.

acceptableUse.title: Jëfandikoo bu wóor
acceptableUse.itemNoAbuse: Buleen yébbi wànte yu soppeeku yoon, bonnaanu, walla mbaa jëfandikoo auto yi; bul spam.
acceptableUse.itemSuspend: Mën nañu taxaw/tëye soo daldi yegg yoon.

yourContent.title: Sa mbir yi
yourContent.body: Yaw nga am sa njariñ ci sa mbir. Nga joxe nu sañ-sañ yi japp ngir doxal sarwiis bi (misal, yónnee, denc, tekki).

disclaimer.title: Ndigeelu kaw ak lajj
disclaimer.body: Sarwiis bi ñu joxe ko “ni mu nekk” akul ndigeelu. Ci lu yoon man, Chatforia du wara def lajj ci mbir yu jëkka-ñaane walla yu sonn yi.

changes.title: Yeesal
changes.body: Mën nañu soppali teere yii; jëfandikoo bi ci kanam mooy tekki nangu gi.

doNotSell.title: Bul Jaay walla Bokku Sama Xibaaru Kii
doNotSell.body: Chatforia du jaay xibaaru nit. Waaye ñi dëkk California mën nañu dalal laaj ci suñu CPRA ci butoŋ bi ci suuf.

cookies.title: Tegtal Cookies
cookies.body: Chatforia jëfandikoo cookies tuuti (misal, sesioŋ, kaarange). Duñu jëfandikoo cookiesu ad yu ñeneen. Jappoŋeel cookies yi ci tegtali sa joowkat.
